body.name: Boho Tribal Runner Rug - 2'6" x 8' Long Oriental Hallway Rug Runner Kitchen Mat, Soft Non-Slip Machine Washable Stair Carpet Runner for Hall Living Room Bedroom Sunroom (Red,2'6" x 8')
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 12 hrs 19 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 【 Soft& Design】Mecko area rugs have been deliberately antiqued and exude a timeless vintage charm that adds character to any space. This rug is made of high-quality faux wool fibers; Soft to the touch, and lint-free.

【Ultra-thin & Safe】This ultra-thin rug can be easily placed in entryways and under furniture without getting stuck in doors and becoming a tripping hazard. The rug features a 0.24-inch ultra-soft velvet surface that is incredibly soft. Sweeping robots can all move freely and cleanly without obstacles.

【Child & Pet Friendly】Soft carpet provides safety for your children and reduces the likelihood of injuries caused by falls. Pets' paws won't get hooked or caught on the edges, causing them to scratch the floor.

【Non-Slip & Stable 】Our washable rugs are made with high-quality Non-Slip TPR latex backing, clear upthe need to purchase an additional carpet Non-Slip pad, which effectively keeps the rug in a stable position, preventing dangerous movement and slips, and keeps your family's activities safe. This indoor rug can be used in frequent walking situations such as home entrances, living rooms, bedrooms, dining rooms, etc.

【Machine Washable】Use a broom or rag for daily cleaning to prevent dirt and debris from seeping into the fibers. A washer and dryer can also be used for deeper cleaning. Easy to maintain a new look. Rugs may wrinkle temporarily when folded and packaged, it is recommended to roll the rug in the opposite direction to give the creases time to flatten and set.
body.description: Mecko Machine Washable Rugs Warm Your Family We provide comfort for lovers of vintage distressed rugs. our trellis rugs are professionally designed in classic, faded patterns and colors. rugs are packaged folded and may arrive with temporary creases. You can use heavy objects such as books, plants, etc. to flatten the problem areas of the carpet or try steaming or heating the carpet with a hair dryer, or you can simply roll the carpet in the opposite direction you did before so that you have a nice flat surface. 1. A high-definition decorative top surface design constructed of stain-resistant material absorbs water and is ideal for scraping dirt from shoes before it's tracked indoors. 2. Designed with resilience against everyday wear and tear, this rug is kid and pet-friendly, perfect for high-traffic areas of your home such as the bedroom, mudroom, kitchen, and front door. 3. Elegantly enhance your entryway with the Mecko Retro Doormat, and add character to the entrance of your home by choosing a doormat with a different pattern and suitable size.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Elegant Style, Unbeatable Quality Mecko is a manufacturer specializing in rugs and floor mats. Since our establishment in 2005, we have been committed to providing high-quality products to our customers. Mecko carpet and floor mat products are designed to enhance the beauty and functionality of your home or workspace while providing you with a comfortable and safe environment. Bedroom Living room Kitchen Entrance Mecko Machine Washable Rugs Warm Your Family We provide comfort for lovers of vintage distressed rugs. our trellis rugs are professionally designed in classic, faded patterns and colors. rugs are packaged folded and may arrive with temporary creases. You can use heavy objects such as books, plants, etc. to flatten the problem areas of the carpet or try steaming or heating the carpet with a hair dryer, or you can simply roll the carpet in the opposite direction you did before so that you have a nice flat surface. 1. A high-definition decorative top surface design constructed of stain-resistant material absorbs water and is ideal for scraping dirt from shoes before it's tracked indoors. 2. Designed with resilience against everyday wear and tear, this rug is kid and pet-friendly, perfect for high-traffic areas of your home such as the bedroom, mudroom, kitchen, and front door. 3. Elegantly enhance your entryway with the Mecko Retro Doormat, and add character to the entrance of your home by choosing a doormat with a different pattern and suitable size.

Soft Skin-friendly Fabric Our fabric is made of soft short plush fabric, which feels smooth and elastic.The printing materials are all green living materials and will not cause any harm to the human body and the environment. Anti-slip Backing The latest anti-slip rubber backing protects you from injury when moving on the rugs. Exquisite Sewing Our carpet hemming is sewn with strong threads, which will not cause problems such as thread stripping and color fading. Exquisite pattern Using the latest printing technology can ensure that the pattern texture of the carpet is clear, the color is bright, and it is durable and does not fade, making your home space more beautiful.

reviews.reviewText: This rug is so soft , also love it that's its washable I have 3 dogs love the idea I can wash it and it will be like new

reviews.reviewText: Absolutely perfect. Didn't expect it to be so soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very nice design, soft and good quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow! Super soft and comfy
reviews.reviewText: Me, and the dogs!, are loving how soft these carpets are. Loving the color, I got the blue—the perfect accent to the kitchen and hallways.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome rug for the price
reviews.reviewText: Got this little rug to go in front of my wet bar area. I'm impressed with this rug. I like the rubber back it has so it doesn't slide around, and it's pretty! It's thin and inexpensive but that's exactly what I wanted, so I'm very happy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Really pretty light weight rug. Really warms up the room. The colors are beautiful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: great runner, love that i can wash it weekly and it is still vibrant in color and came out clean. washing it 4 times already and it has not unraveled/etc. i even put runner in dryer on low heat to dry it. will be buying more of these when new rugs are need in other areas.
